arts.ttl: Promotion rivals share the points at Valley Parade
arts.sum: Ciaran Kelly gave Bradford the lead but a superb equaliser from David McGoldrick earned Notts County a draw.

arts.ttl: Bradford vs Notts County Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: Second-placed Bradford host sixth-placed Notts County in a crucial League Two clash on Thursday, April 17th, at 20:00. A win for the home side could see them leapfrog Port Vale to the top of the table...

arts.ttl: Preview: Bradford City vs. Notts County - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's League Two clash between Bradford City and Notts County, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
